aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro: âœˆï¸ At YourCompany, we believe travel should be simple, accessible, and exciting. Since our beginning in 2025, we've been committed to creating stress-free travel experiences.
aboutUs.missionText: To offer travelers all flight, lodging, and experience options in one place. Our goal is to remove the confusion of online booking and put you in control.
difference: Compare hundreds of airlines in seconds
Intuitive platform with no invasive ads
aboutUs.teamText: Our team is made up of travel, technology, and customer service enthusiasts. We work from multiple countries to bring you the best experience possible.

reservas.questions.question: How can I search for a flight?
reservas.questions.answer: Just enter origin, destination, and dates in the main form and click 'Search'.

reservas.questions.question: Can I book flights for more than one person?
reservas.questions.answer: Yes, select the number of passengers in the search form before starting your search.

pagos.questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
pagos.questions.answer: Credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and other secure methods depending on the country.

pagos.questions.question: Are taxes included in the price?
pagos.questions.answer: Yes, the final price shown includes mandatory taxes and fees.

cambios.questions.question: Can I cancel my flight?
cambios.questions.answer: It depends on the fare. Some allow cancellation with full or partial refund.

cambios.questions.question: Can I change the travel date?
cambios.questions.answer: Yes, but it may have an additional cost depending on the airline and fare type.
